CmdLine: apk upgrade --update &&     apk add       bash       tzdata       vim       tini       su-exec       gzip       tar       wget       curl &&     echo 'hosts: files mdns4_minimal [NOTFOUND=return] dns mdns4' >> /etc/nsswitch.conf &&     wget -O /tmp/dockerize.tar.gz https://github.com/jwilder/dockerize/releases/download/$DOCKERIZE_VERSION/dockerize-alpine-linux-amd64-$DOCKERIZE_VERSION.tar.gz &&     tar -C /usr/local/bin -xzvf /tmp/dockerize.tar.gz &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* &&     rm -rf /tmp/* &&     rm -rf /var/log/*
Commands.Name: run
